description: This is the canoe path through the dead trees in Lois lake.  This is the first part of the Powell Lake canoe route.
directions: Start at the Powell Lakes canoe route start in Lois lake.  For detailed directions and a description of the entire route, with portages, please see other two listings on Trailpeak (use search and enter powell), this one was allowed because it has track data and in the GPS data, lots of Waypoint that may be of interest.
title: Lois lake canoe
